name: Daniel W Kuehnel
coverLetter: Horticulture experience for over 5 years. Trimmed cannabis for 3 years by myself. No felony convictions. Ex military vet I can adapt and strive in almost any conditions. I would be able to find accommodations before employment for shelter food ECT. I'd use what I earn from work to prpvide for myself so others wouldn't. If any spot available for tent for few days id pitch until I could get into some other place. I'm hardworking individual willing to travel for periods of time so my sick wife and 3 kids are provided for at home financially from myself working.
